content: ZHU Feida | SMU Faculty Directory showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile ZHU Feida Full-time Faculty Associate Professor of Computer Science; Associate Dean, Partnerships and Engagement; Recipient, Aptos Move Professorship School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, University of Illinois, 2009 Teaching Topics Data Mining & Business Analytics Courses related to Business Intelligence & Analytics Computer as an Analysis Tool Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to THIA Boon Sing +65 68085101 fdzhu@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas and Areas of Expertise School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceData Management & MiningMachine Learning & IntelligenceLearning & WorkAnalytics & Decision SupportHealth & WellbeingSocial AnalyticsSafety, Security & FairnessPrivacy-Preserving Data Sharing & AnalyticsSecurity & Governance of Software/AI Systems Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation Unlocking the personal data economy, with privacy by design Leveraging Big Data Analytics for Business & Financial Innovation
